categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Thorpe was a male Human who served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Army during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, when he was stationed on the planet Balmorra. He was involved in the Imperial Conquest Consolidation Corps's efforts to crush the Balmorran resistance, and disapproved of his colleague Lieutenant Davrill's penchant for explosions.
